docs.title: Introduction
docs.text:
Research writing is more and more a team effort and multiple people contribute to different parts of the manuscript. This follows corrections, additions and revisions at different stages. So, using a version control system like git could be make the process much easier at many levels.

This documentation aims to provide a brief, yet complete account on integrating LaTex with git. In addition, when the project is integrated with github, it provides seamless collaboration and cloud-syncing.

docs.title: Outline
docs.text: There are three parts in the documentation. Part one focuses on the importance of LaTeX and its installation. Second part focuses on preparing a manuscript with LaTeX. It introduces preamble, sections and other options in detail. Final part discusses the integration of LaTeX with git and github. The template file is available within this repository and you can use it from the header link.
